title: Negotiate an Offer in Compromise (OIC)
description: A taxpayer with significant tax debt and limited ability to pay wants to negotiate a settlement with the IRS for less than the full amount owed.

tasks.description: Gather detailed financial information from the taxpayer using Form 433-A.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all data on the taxpayer's income, expenses, assets, and liabilities.

tasks.description: Calculate the taxpayer's reasonable collection potential (RCP) to determine a viable offer amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the minimum amount the IRS would likely accept.

tasks.description: Prepare and submit Form 656, Offer in Compromise, with all supporting documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent files a complete and compelling OIC package on behalf of the taxpayer.
